entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuildWorkspace methods can't be called in the same method body as MSBuildLocator.RegisterInstance #78478
  • Fail to compile C# 14.0 extension with interface constraint using implicit additional type parameters #78472
  • New APIs for "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature #78468
  • "Go to Definition (F12) with Source Link no longer works after updating to Visual Studio 2022 17.12" #78465
  • CodeFix provider crashes #78464
  • Allow limiting scope of code fix to staged files #78462

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10605.64 #78477
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10606.70 #78476
  • .NET Core 3.1 ambiguous call when extending an interface from a nuget package #78474
  • VS2022 Incorrectly Modifies Event Handler Return Type #78409
  • #! "shebang" directives have changed from disallowed to allowed in ordinary files in recent compilers #78301
    Next
  • new extension syntax crashes build with certain event syntax #78413
  • Correctness CI failing with roslyn-analyzers documentation errors #78414

PullRequests

Created

  • *** WIP: Remove now unused methods from IWorkspaceProjectContext #78479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Update SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds if GetFirstRelatedDocumentId ends up needing to do a full solution search. #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sem update #78467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move SpecializedCollections to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections namespace #78466
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Don't unnecessarily create a document when only the document state is needed #78463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Add syntax highlighting of ignored directives #78458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Ignored Directives

Merged

  • More extension operators declaration work #78457
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update to platform background work pattern to make porting to their impl easier #78469
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md and Update Compiler Test Plan.md for instance operators #78460
    Area-Compilers, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next
  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove default impl of BackgroundWorkIndicator #78470
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid buffering and dispatching all ProducerConsumer items in one go in recent copilot helper. #78454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add copilot tests IVT to ExternalAccess.Copilot #78455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not parse URIs during LSP serialization/deserialization #76691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'extensions' #78461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Merge main into features/dictionary-expressions #78443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Change `++`/`--` predefined operator names for instance operators #78434
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next
  • Add WorkItem trait discoverer #78438
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow shebang in project-based programs #78411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next
  • Merge "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature to 'main' #78400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next

Updated

  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix razor redirect #78448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve some follow-up comments on signature conflicts and betterness #78442
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.12] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Ensure we log what the HTTP error message is if we get a failure #78418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support interpolated string handlers in extension blocks #78425
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
